name: Tap & Grow - Bubble mania
description:
Tap and grow floating balls until they add up to 100. If they touch when red then you are dead.
Tap & Grow - Bubble mania is a fast reflexes game where players touch bubble balls to make them grow without overlapping. In the game's many different levels, the player interacts with different types of bubble balls to bring a counter to the number 100.

Test your memory and concentration in Memory Station. Find a pair and collect the bonus before the time runs out.
Pop bubble balls and use special power.

If you like Hundreds, this game is a great choice.
